message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose something fair.  I'll take a little extra this time.
I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve the bigger share
This is a reasonable offer Alice, especially considering the inflation.
Inflation is hitting you harder, I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect too much
Alice, the clock is ticking, and inflation is eating our money. This is my final offer.
